metadata.description: Transform Claude Code into a thoughtful development partner with requirements clarification, implementation planning, breakthrough generation, and automated GitHub PR workflows

plugins.name: thoughtful-dev
plugins.description: Complete thoughtful development workflow with 3 core skills: requirements-clarifier (prevents premature coding), implementation-planner (analyzes approaches and risks), and breakthrough-generator (systematic problem-solving when stuck). Includes safety-first git workflow, black-box architecture principles, and progressive documentation templates.

plugins.name: github-push-pr
plugins.description: Complete GitHub workflow automation with 4 core skills: git-workflow-enforcer (ensures feature branch usage), pr-creator (automated PR creation with security checks), claudebot-feedback-loop (iterative ClaudeBot feedback application), and thoughtful-pr-workflow (end-to-end orchestrator). Prevents secrets commits, enforces git best practices, and automates PR iteration cycles.
